alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 05 at 2:08AM PST until February 05 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts to 70 mph are possible along Highway 95 near Walker Lake. Travel restrictions for high profile vehicles are likely.
info.instruction: Follow instructions on highway signs and do not attempt travel on restricted highways. Winds could be strong enough to push your vehicle out of your travel lane. Check with NDOT for the latest road information.
